name: Suspensus Somnium Mechanism
description: A complex and intricate adeptal mechanism created by the hand of Cloud Retainer that can miraculously soothe the mind, aid with sleep, and help those afflicted with amnesia find themselves.\nHowever, as its creator said: "We adepti can only help those who first resolve to help themselves." Although adeptal mechanisms are truly wondrous, they are not omnipotent. If you wish to realize your dream, you must ultimately rely upon your indefatigable efforts...
